Problem Name: 7. What exactly would you say OR how exactly would you respond in order to help Alexis manage the inequity related to her learning by assisting her to advocate for herself?
Input: Alexis, it sounds like you're facing a tough situation during quiz time. It's frustrating when you're unable to hear the teacher's questions and don't receive the support you need. Here's a suggestion: why don't we write a note together explaining your difficulty to the teacher? You can politely explain how the noisy heater makes it hard for you to hear, and ask if there's a way you can be accommodated during quizzes. It's important to speak up for yourself, and I'm here to support you every step of the way.
